channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Justice department can release Ghislaine Maxwell court materials, judge says
item.description: Records could be made public within 10 days under new Epstein Files Transparency Act The justice department can publicly release investigative materia...

item.title: Florida declares US Muslim civil rights group a foreign terrorist organization
item.description: Ron DeSantis’s legally dubious order designating Cair – and Muslim Brotherhood – follows similar move by Texas Florida is declaring the Council on Ame...

item.title: Badenoch admits Brexit has damaged economy as she announces plan to review benefits system – UK politics live
item.description: Tory leader says financial crisis, Brexit and Covid have all hit the economy and a review of which conditions deserve benefits is needed Badenoch says...

item.title: Ukraine and Europe will be ready to present ‘refined’ peace plan to US ‘in near future’, Zelenskyy says – live
item.description: Zelenskyy stressed that Ukraine remained ‘committed to a real peace’ after US president hints he could walk away from Kyiv Oh, and a little warning sh...

item.title: ‘America deserves better’: former justice department workers sign letter decrying Trump’s purge of civil rights division – live
item.description: Attorneys say they left because the administration ‘turned the Division’s core mission upside down, largely abandoning its duty to protect civil right...

item.title: New flu strain is circulating - so should you buy a vaccine this year?
item.description: Flu has come early and experts predict it could be a particularly nasty season, with a new strain circulating.

item.title: Minimum wage should not go any higher, suggests Badenoch
item.description: Badenoch claimed Labour had tipped the balance too far against workers and in favour of welfare.

item.title: TV faithful Claudia Winkleman made MBE by King at Windsor Castle
item.description: The Traitors and Strictly presenter was recognised on Tuesday for services to broadcasting.

item.title: Much of £11bn Covid scheme fraud 'beyond recovery', report finds
item.description: The response to the pandemic led to "enormous outlays of public money which exposed it to the risk of fraud and error", a report says.

item.title: Trump criticises 'weak' European leaders over Ukraine and immigration
item.description: In his latest public criticism of Europe, the US president claims countries are "decaying".
